attributes.action: Get Caught With A Knife, Go In For Life
attributes.additional_details:
Some people cross the road when they see a group of teenagers, because they’re scared something will happen to them.
We shouldn’t be living in a world where we’re scared of 14 and 15 year olds! 
We are their superiors, what happened to the days where you could tell a kid or smack them upside the head and be done with it! 
If this petition reaches 100,000 signatures, it will be taken to parliament for debate! 
So if you want to stop being scared, please sign and please share.
Caught with a knife, go in for life.
attributes.background:
We have reached the point in the UK where 90% of teenagers are carrying a knife on them, I’m not just talking about boys, girls are carrying them also.
There is only one way we’re going to be able to put a stop to it. 
Some people are scared to leave their houses due to teenagers.
